dcterms:creator: Alex Kendall
Matthew Grimes
Roberto Cipolla
dcterms:description: Cambridge Landmarks includes 6 datasets of outdoor scenes, namely Street, Great Court, King’s College, St. Mary’s Church, Old Hospital and Shop Facade, spanning areas ranging from 875m2 up to 50000m2. Each dataset includes a sequence of RGB frames with their corresponding labels, i.e. the motor coefficients [α, β12, ...γ] representing the camera pose.
dcterms:title: Cambridge Landmarks

dcterms:creator: Jamie Shotton
Ben Glocker
Christopher Zach
Shahram Izadi
Antonio Criminisi
Andrew Fitzgibbon
dcterms:description: 7 Scenes includes 7 datasets of indoor scenes, namely Office, Pumpkin, Red Kitchen, Heads, Fire, Stairs and Chess, each spanning a volume not larger than 18m3. The dataset was intended for RGB-D relocalization and has been captured through a Kinect RGB-D sensor.
dcterms:title: 7 Scenes
